DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness two combine therapeutic method include corticosteroid injection elbow cast versus ice massage non-steroidal anti inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Combined Therapeutic Methods Treatment Lateral Epicondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized clinical trial . Setting : Boo-Ali Baqyiatallah Hospital Tehran . Patients : 50 randomly select patient , two group 25 subject . Interventions : Corticosteroid injection elbow cast versus ice NSAIDs . Outcome measure : Patients evaluate outcome , complication patient ' satisfaction 2nd , 4th , 12th week begin treatment . We measure pain severity Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) .
